programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost - When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. // Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep901
programme.desc: Liberty Makes a New Friend - Liberty mistakenly brings a bear into town, thinking it's someone's pet. She must fix her mistake and rescue Chickaletta.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum / The Crew Builds a Wheelchair Ramp - After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! // When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail by building ramps all over town.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Going Boating - Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, Miss Rabbit has all sorts of boats for hire. All the families have a race and Daddy Pig wishes he hadn't picked a boat which has to be peddled.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep604
programme.desc: The Children's Fete - The school roof is leaky again, so the children organize a fair to raise money for a new roof.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep605
programme.desc: The Aquarium - Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep606
programme.desc: George's Racing Car - It's a beautiful day, but Peppa, George, Daddy Pig, and Grandpa Pig are sitting inside watching racecar driving on television!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Strawberries - Anna and Froga are excited to make the best strawberry pie ever with the first strawberries of the season. Anna makes a plan to distract Christopher while they make the pie!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Swing - When Anna and Froga discover the old seat of their swing, they are excited to hang it on the apple tree. But the ropes to attach it have gone missing!The two friends' search for the missing ropes turns out to be more difficult than they had imagined!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Josh and Blue's Ice Cream Shop - Josh and Blue are serving up ice cream on a hot, summer day, but there's just one problem--everyone is gone! Where is everyone? While playing Blue's Clues to figure it out, we help Jingles the ice cream truck and even learn how to make ice cream!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep901
programme.desc: Liberty Makes a New Friend / Pups Save the Pup Pup Boogie Contest - Liberty mistakenly brings a bear into town, thinking it's someone's pet. She must fix her mistake and rescue Chickaletta. // Francois' hot-air balloon goes out of control before the Pup Pup Boogie Contest. The Pups, with Liberty, race to the rescue.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep826
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Big Leak / Pups Save a Baby Anteater - The Pups rescue Francois from a water tower geyser. // The Pups rescue a baby anteater stuck on a bucking RoboHorse.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway - A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Sandcastle Calamity / Owl-Ert - Steel upsets a family of sand crabs when he makes a huge sandcastle for Stu and Safia. // Kai rushes through a voice-recognition upgrade on Janice and she ends up mistaking the hoots of a baby owl as commands from Alex, making his gadgets go crazy.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Paddington's Beach Clean-Up / Paddington's Holiday Farewell - The beach is a mess, but will all the litter be cleared in time for the beach party that everyone has been looking forward to? // The summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Pups Rescue a Rescuer - Mayor Goodway tries to help the PAW Patrol rescue Danny, but the pups end up having to rescue the rescuer, too!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Crew & Marshall Build A Fire Station - Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep111
programme.desc: New New Year / Finders Keepers / Busy Buddies - Bossy is worried his family does not celebrate the Korean New Year "the right way. // Bossy finds a cool toy but doesn't want to give it up. // Bossy and Turtle overtask themselves when they take on all class jobs at once.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Shadowland / Medievel Tides - Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Daddy Shack / Rocky-Bye - After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him. // Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Three is a Magic Number / Off the Map - With the help of El Guardin, the crew solves the puzzle of their new headquarters in order to unlock a secret treasure. // The crew journey to the unknown corners of the ocean and discover a real-life Sea Monster who needs their help.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep103
programme.desc: To The Lighthouse - When a storm blows out the lighthouse light, Santi and crew hurry to guide Mami and Abuelo back from sea.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep607
programme.desc: The Little Boat - Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep608
programme.desc: The Sandpit - Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses, and shops.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep609
programme.desc: Night Animals - It's night time at Grandpa and Granny Pig's house, and Peppa and George have stayed up late to help hunt for slugs and snails.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep614
programme.desc: Mirrors - George has fun looking at himself in the mirror. Peppa and George try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep615
programme.desc: Pedro is Late - The playgroup is going on a trip to the museum. Everyone, is on the bus ready to go. But where is Pedro Pony?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep616
programme.desc: Garden Games - Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches - The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep716
programme.desc: Wild West Heroes - Yeehaw! Blaze, AJ, and Starla are on their way to a Wild West Picnic! But when the Lunchbox Bandit steals everyone's lunchboxes, it's up to our Wild West Heroes to get them back!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep519
programme.desc: The Treat Thief - Officer Blaze just got his biggest case yet: tracking down the mischievous Treat Thief! With help from Officer Anna, Blaze sets out to stop the thief and recover every stolen treat!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep907
programme.desc: Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art - Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand - When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Round-Up / Deep Goo Sea - When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors. // William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Deep Dark Disco - The Sharks help Wavey Jones find his disco ball so he can throw a jaw-some party.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Let Justice Be done / The Great Spring Clean - Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Paddington's Hero Squad / Paddinton's Knightly Quest - Paddington, Jonathan and Judy gain super powers from a superfood cake, but are they real heroes? // Paddington is on a mission to become a Knight; but he just needs to complete three heroic quests in a day!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Return of the Thinking Squad - It's a bird! It's a plane! No, it's a clue! The Thinking Squad needs to find all three clues to figure out how to stop the dastardly Villain Ice before he freezes Super City. Thinking Squad, to the rescue!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Crew Does A Home Renovation / The Crew Builds A Lighthouse - The pups are starstruck when their favorite TV renovation star, Hank Hammer, comes to see them at work. // Cap'n Turbot is bringing Mayor Greatway a big surprise. But when a thick fog rolls in, the pups have to build a lighthouse fast!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep716
programme.desc: Wild West Heroes - Yeehaw! Blaze, AJ, and Starla are on their way to a Wild West Picnic! But when the Lunchbox Bandit steals everyone's lunchboxes, it's up to our Wild West Heroes to get them back!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep217
programme.desc: The Secret Room / Little Shrimp, Big Problems - Pepito traps our Pirate Protectors inside a secret room in El Escondite that they can only escape from by working together. // The grand opening of Martn's paleta shop is almost ruined when a mysterious creature begins wreaking havoc in Merlandia.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Coach Grandma / Busy Baby - Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Space Invader / Reindeer's Game / Short Kites - After a long day of adventures together, Turtle needs space from Bossy. // Bossy and Turtle get distracted by a video game and lost Roller's backpack. // Bossy and Turtle want to fly a kite but Bossy's room must be clean first.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost - When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. // Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep901
programme.desc: Liberty Makes a New Friend - Liberty mistakenly brings a bear into town, thinking it's someone's pet. She must fix her mistake and rescue Chickaletta.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum / The Crew Builds a Wheelchair Ramp - After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! // When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail by building ramps all over town.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Going Boating - Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, Miss Rabbit has all sorts of boats for hire. All the families have a race and Daddy Pig wishes he hadn't picked a boat which has to be peddled.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Mr Bull in a China Shop - While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Fruit - It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies. Everyone is picking their favourite fruits to blend. George gets a special 'dinosaur' juice, to make him big and strong. Roar!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep620
programme.desc: George's Balloon - George is finding it difficult to keep hold of his big balloon. Can anyone stop it from flying off to the moon?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Treasure - Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit in Space - Grampy Rabbit visits Peppa's playgroup to talk about space rockets. The talk is going very well until suddenly Grampy Rabbit looses his voice. Can Doctor Brown Bear get him talking again?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Double Dare You / Roy - On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep418
programme.desc: The Silly Smelly Smell - Yikes, there's a smelly smell in the house, and nobody nose where it's coming from! We need YOU to join the Smell-busters to help figure it out as we learn more about the five senses!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep915
programme.desc: Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf - When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Splash Park / The Crew Builds A Playroom - With their splash park plans in troubled waters, the pups have to get creative to cool down the town for the summer. // As the pups work on building a surprise playroom for Lucas and Lily, a squirrelly visitor causes construction complications.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Going Off With A Bang / Talent For Trouble - Steel and the Deer Squad want to organise a surprise party for Professor Scratch's birthday but the twins almost ruin the party. // To win the big talent show, Stu and Safia get Professor Scratch to programme Dinobot to obey their every command.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Paddington the Rare Bear and Mr.Brilliant / Paddington and the Accidental Hero - Windsor Gardens has two new heroes - Mr Brilliant and Rare Bear, but will Jonathan and Judy be impressed? // Jonathan is hailed a hero after saving a rare gnome, but was the rescue as heroic as the stories he tells?

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep917
programme.desc: Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger - When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A School / The Crew Builds A Waterway - It's the first day of school in Builder Cove... if Rubble & Crew can finish the building in time! / The pups need a construction solution to save Farmer Zoe's crops and to keep Crunchy the beaver from taking all the water!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Dad's Day Off / Scout's Honor / The Magic Word - Bossy and Bissy run errands with Dad. // Bossy and Turtle learn its okay to ask for help. // Bossy and Turtle learn about the word "please".

programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza / The Present - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town. // Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish / Sleeping Like a Baby - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. // Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Treasure of El Bravo - After Enrique steals the heart of El Bravo, there's only one person who can help Santi and crew save the day: Toms's younger sister, Prima Tina!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Golden Giant - When Enrique awakens a giant, Santi and crew must find a way to save the day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep626
programme.desc: Snowy Mountain - Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle is very good at skiing and was once a world champion! But in the end it is Mummy Pig who impresses everyone...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Gardening - Peppa and George enjoy helping Grandpa Pig plant seeds in his garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Hiccups - George gets hiccups when he drinks his juice too quickly, so Peppa tries to cure him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Bicycles - Daddy Pig has grown a huge pumpkin and Peppa is riding her bike, but says she wants to ride without training wheels. But soon she crashes into the pumpkin.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Secrets - Mummy Pig gives Peppa a box, which has to be kept a secret.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Flying a Kite - Peppa and George go outside to fly their kite, but the kite gets stuck in a tree.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Grass is Always Greener... / When I Grow Up - Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep717
programme.desc: Super Wheels vs. The Bubblemaker - Super Wheels to the rescue! When the Bubblemaker starts trapping everything in his trouble bubbles, Blaze and Sparkle have to become superheroes to save Axle City!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep602
programme.desc: The Amazing Stunt Kitty - When a big stunt goes awry, Darington is sent flying away on an out-of-control balloon! Now, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Darington's sidekick Stunt Kitty to save the day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep921
programme.desc: Pups Save a Flamingo Dancer / Pups Save a Mayor and Her Mini - The Paw Patrol searches for Julia, Julius and a flamingo when they go missing from a dance contest. // The Paw Patrol comes to the rescue when Mayor Goodway and her niece Julia get stuck on a runaway art installation.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep805
programme.desc: Pups Save The Mustache - The Pups must help to find Mayor Humdinger's mustache after he accidentally shaves it off before it's about to be on the cover of a magazine.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Seaweed Sway / Flow Bros - Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, 'The Seaweed Sway'. // When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Finception - When Hank accidentally takes an important treasure from Swimmy Hall, he goes on a sneaky mission to set things right.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Cave Barbapapas / The Little Monsters - The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Paddington's Race Against the Storm / Paddington's Super Snail - Judy finds her inner hero when a storm hits on a Rangers Camping trip, and they need to shelter from the weather // Paddington befriends a speedy snail, who is so fast she has a heroic future ahead, but why does she look so sad?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Happy Birthday, Sage & Ginger - It's Sage & Ginger's first birthday party! The whole Spice Family is ready to celebrate, but there's no cake! Josh plays Blue's Clues to figure out who will make the cake, and even visits Birthday Party World along the way.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep117
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Observatory / The Crew Builds A Zipline - The pups jump into action to build an observatory to help their friend River get a cool picture of a shooting star! // After meeting Park Ranger Rose, the pups get stuck on a nature trail. But Rubble & Crew, finds a construction solution.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep717
programme.desc: Super Wheels vs. The Bubblemaker - Super Wheels to the rescue! When the Bubblemaker starts trapping everything in his trouble bubbles, Blaze and Sparkle have to become superheroes to save Axle City!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Giddy-Up Games / The Golden Guitar - The crew agree to play a series of cowboy-themed games against the villainous Barbarito in an attempt to win a treasure. // Toms breaks his guitar while trying to retrieve the golden guitar of his idol and learns that music comes from within.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night / Bad Hank - The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun. // When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy like Shadow.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Lil' Kimchi King and Kween / Don't Go Miss Elky / Doctor Chipper - Turtle wants to win a contest but he's up against Honey Bear. // When Bossy thinks Miss Elky is planning to leave forever, he tries to convince her to stay. // Bossy Turtle and Roller helps Chipper face her fear of going to the doctor's.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep923
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Feathery Friends / Pups Save a Puffy Mayor - The Paw Patrol must rescue Mr. Porter and reunite an ostrich family before the big birds get into big trouble. // During Mayor Goodway's fashion show, the Pups must save Farmer Al and Mayor Humdinger after a puffy shirt floats away with them.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Library Tea Shop / The Crew Builds A Dance Floor - Construction on the first Builder Cove library is abuzz with bees! This calls for an extra sweet constuction solution. / Grandpa Gravel teaches Charger all his best moves for the big dance contest. But will a runaway disco ball cost them first place?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Picnic - Peppa and her family go for a picnic. Daddy Pig falls asleep after eating so much, but then gets some exercise being chased by a wasp!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Peppa's Circus - Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep624
programme.desc: The Fish Pond - Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Olden Days - Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Detectives - Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Super Christopher - Christopher visits Anna with his " Super Christopher" costume, ready for adventure! But being a superhero comes with a whole set of challenges. Christopher isn't just a superhero. He's also a super friend.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep418
programme.desc: The Silly Smelly Smell - Yikes, there's a smelly smell in the house, and nobody nose where it's coming from! We need YOU to join the Smell-busters to help figure it out as we learn more about the five senses!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep915
programme.desc: Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf - When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep901
programme.desc: Pups Save the Pup Pup Boogie Contest - Francois' hot-air balloon goes out of control before the Pup Pup Boogie Contest. The Pups, with Liberty, race to the rescue.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep82
programme.desc: Stuck - All of the Teletubbies are stuck. Tinky Winky's hand is stuck in the bag, Dipsy's hat is stuck, Laa-Laa's ball is stuck and Po is stuck on the Tubby Slidey!

programme.title: Yakka Dee S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Bird - Dee encourages a friend to say 'bird' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different birds including a swimming bird, a napping bird and even a rapping bird!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep18
programme.desc: The Big Thank You - The friends throw an amazing party for Helping Hand! But with so much to do, can Phoebe work with her friends to get everything ready in time?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Comet - Messy has to save OKIDO from a falling comet before his bedtime! He sees that Mayor Oki still has his bath!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep54
programme.desc: Parcel Puzzle - When Violet tells Monty that a problem is too big for a little boy to solve, he wonders if only big people can solve big problems.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep40
programme.desc: Octopus - When Chloe tries to teach her dad to improvise and play Bluey's game of Octopus at home, he finds it hard to understand or enjoy, until they both realize they can play it their own way.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Making Music Badge - When the squirrels find Duggee playing saxophone, they want to have a go too. Several pots, balloons, tins, water and tubes later and the squirrels are making music. And boy, are they loud!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep52
programme.desc: The Story Badge - The squirrels do everything at the clubhouse, from reading and drawing, to running and dancing, and tire themselves out, so Duggee suggests they have a break with a story.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep51
programme.desc: The Teddy Bear Badge - The dog and the squirrels take their teddy bears out for a picnic. However, they soon spot a huge teddy and discover it's Beryl.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep35
programme.desc: The Blarney Stone, Ireland - Kyan has to use some smooth talking to save the tourists and protect Blarney Castle.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep34
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Stop Those Superweeds - Some fast-growing plants that don't belong on Academy Island are in danger of taking over. Can the Go Jetters stop the superweed from damaging the Academy and Grim HQ?

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Bad Mood - Bingo is playing Bad Mood with Dad, standing on his feet as Dad stomps around the house, controlling everything Bingo does and causing chaos.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep38
programme.desc: Double Babysitter - When Uncle Rad and Frisky accidentally turn up to babysit Bluey and Bingo on the same night, they have to work together to make Bluey feel better about babysitter put-downs.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Andy and the Sarcastic Fringehead - Andy heads to the Pacific coast of California in search of a sarcastic fringehead.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Water Machines - Grace shows off three incredible machines that can go on water!Grace goes for a ride on a quad bike that turns into a jet ski, and shows off a vehicle that floats using its wheels!

programme.title: Swashbuckle S6 Ep16
programme.desc: Silent Disco - Captain HeyHo likes her peace and quiet. Unfortunately for her, Cook and Line have found an old boombox, which is very loud and still working perfectly!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep17
programme.desc: The Sharing Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels bake a pie and learn how to share by dividing things between everyone equally.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep16
programme.desc: The Philosophy Badge - The Squirrels think about life's big questions, helping Tino the artistic mouse escape a crisis of confidence and gaining their Philosophy badges in the process.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep15
programme.desc: The Future Badge - The Squirrels are transported into the future where they encounter a robot version of Duggee - and a few other interesting changes to the clubhouse too!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep33
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Geo Challenge - The Go Jetters test their knowledge and teamwork in a tricky maze full of trials. But can they escape the labyrinth, beat Glitch's high score and still keep the team together?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep32
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: New Species - The team goes on a jungle expedition to find a mysterious creature. But while they race to discover a brand new species, something seems to be watching them from the treetops.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S16 Ep18
programme.desc: The Christmas Tree Express - It is Christmas on the Island of Sodor. Thomas, Toby and Rheneas are shunting in the Blue Mountain Quarry. Thomas says he is going to pick up a Christmas tree that the Logging Locos have brought from Misty Island.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Pond Prose - Sarah is inspired by listening to a poetry record and decides to make up some poetry of her own.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep36
programme.desc: Moon's Exhibition - A trip to the art gallery unexpectedly helps Duck with the hunt for his lost toy Rhino.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep50
programme.desc: Flash Dance - Nelly and Nora use the lighting flashes to play a new game.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Dog Loves Amazing - While trying to solve a puzzle, Dog and Pug end up looking for a Minotaur in an ancient maze. After a number of false turns, they reach the centre and find the friendly Minotaur.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep53
programme.desc: Take a Break - When Monty sees Violet enjoying doing absolutely nothing, he starts to wonder if it is a good thing to take a break and relax.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep14
programme.desc: It's Time to Play Basketball - JoJo and Gran Gran run into Jared and Cynthia who are playing basketball. JoJo joins in, but she doesn't feel like she is tall enough to play it well.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Ducking and Diving - The baby ducklings are ready to jump the nest but they can't fly yet! Can Team Tinpo solve this duck-diving problem?

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Hiders N' Seekers - In this episode, a small addition brings big excitement to a game of Hide N' Seek!

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep40
programme.desc: Early Baby - Bluey's playgroup is at odds when Indy's baby hospital collides with Rusty's knights and dragons. But in explaining themselves, they both find that their games actually have a lot in common.

programme.desc: The Family Photo Badge - The Squirrels learn that friends can be like an extended family, earning their Family Photo Badges and a brilliant group picture in the process!

programme.desc: The Breakfast Badge - Tag's feeling grumpy because he didn't eat his breakfast, uh-oh! Luckily Duggee has his Breakfast Badge, and soon the Squirrels will too.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Pound for Pound Powerhouses - UFC Unleashed features the best fights from the UFC archives, all in one show. Unleashed brings you the big fights that you missed or want to see all over again.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep911TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: UFC 275 featured the first title defense of newly crowned light heavyweight champion Glover Teixeira against surging contender Jiri Prochazka. See both men train and prepare for their battle for the belt in Singapore.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep506TrevorWittmanatUFC268RVCAAnthonySmith
programme.desc: Trevor Wittman gives his account of the UFC's historic return to Madison Square Garden for UFC 268. We discover the history of the famed RVCA gym in Costa Mesa, California. And Anthony 'Lionheart' Smith shares his thoughts on the UFC light heavyweight division

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC289NunesvsAldana
programme.desc: Mexico's Irene Aldana challenges Brazils Amanda Nunes for the UFC bantamweight title in the main event of UFC 289. Plus, its a clash at lightweight as former champ Charles Oliveira battles Beneil Dariush. See the entire main card, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts
programme.desc: Black History Month Incredible Knockouts - UFC Ultimate Knockouts brings you some of the most devastating finishes ever seen inside the Octagon. From one-punch knockouts to highlight reel kicks, youll see the UFCs biggest names in their most memorable performance.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep10
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep10
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep911TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: UFC 275 featured the first title defense of newly crowned light heavyweight champion Glover Teixeira against surging contender Jiri Prochazka. See both men train and prepare for their battle for the belt in Singapore.

programme.title: 2023-2024 KOVO V-League Women
programme.desc: HILLSTATE VS IBK ALTOS - The 20th season of the KOVO V-League Women sees reigning champions EX Hi-pass defend their title against six fellow professional volleyball teams for the coveted championship in South Korea.

programme.title: Ligue 1: Top 10 Goals
programme.desc: Ligue 1: Top 10 Goals - Power, precision, perfection. Ligue 1s top 10 goals of 22/23 were of the highest order.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Tuivasa vs. Tybura
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the UFCs hardest punchers returns to the Octagon on March 17, as Australian knockout artist Tai Tuivasa travels to the APEX in Las Vegas to tackle fellow top ten heavyweight contender Marcin Tybura. Packing some significant power in his own right, Polands Tybura has won seven of his last nine en route to his showdown with fan favorite Bam Bam, who has ended his last five victories, including wins over Derrick Lewis and Augusto Sakai, via knockout

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Tuivasa vs. Tybura
programme.desc: Main Event - One of the UFCs hardest punchers returns to the Octagon on March 17, as Australian knockout artist Tai Tuivasa travels to the APEX in Las Vegas to tackle fellow top ten heavyweight contender Marcin Tybura. Packing some significant power in his own right, Polands Tybura has won seven of his last nine en route to his showdown with fan favorite Bam Bam, who has ended his last five victories, including wins over Derrick Lewis and Augusto Sakai, via knockout

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback
programme.desc: UFC Fight Flashback 1002: Usman vs. Covington 2 - UFC 268 was headlined by the heated rematch between welterweight king Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and Colby Chaos Covington. Relive their incredible battle with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC 299: O'Malley vs. Vera 2
programme.desc: Prelims - Newly crowned UFC bantamweight champion Sean OMalley has been the talk of the sports world since he took the belt from Aljamain Sterling. But on March 9 at Kaseya Center in Miami, Florida, Suga Sean will face a tough challenge in his first title defense when he meets the only man to beat him, top contender Marlon Chito Vera, in the main event of UFC 299. Ecuadors Vera earned his shot at a world championship with wins over the likes of Frankie Edgar, Rob Font, Dominick Cruz and Pedro Munhoz, but in the three years since they first fought, OMalley has taken his game to new levels, and he is eager to even the score in a high stakes title fight that will have the world watching.

programme.title: UFC 299: O'Malley vs. Vera 2
programme.desc: Main Event - Newly crowned UFC bantamweight champion Sean OMalley has been the talk of the sports world since he took the belt from Aljamain Sterling. programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback

programme.title: UFC 299: O'Malley vs. Vera 2
programme.desc: Prelims - Newly crowned UFC bantamweight champion Sean OMalley has been the talk of the sports world since he took the belt from Aljamain Sterling. But on March 9 at Kaseya Center in Miami, Florida, Suga Sean will face a tough challenge in his first title defense when he meets the only man to beat him, top contender Marlon Chito Vera, in the main event of UFC 299. Ecuadors Vera earned his shot at a world championship with wins over the likes of Frankie Edgar, Rob Font, Dominick Cruz and Pedro Munhoz, but in the three years since they first fought, OMalley has taken his game to new levels, and he is eager to even the score in a high stakes title fight that will have the world watching.
